content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. What’s your name?
Great to meet you, Mike! Can you please give me your address so we can check if our team can help you there?
Thanks, Mike! Let me check if your location is within our service area.
reason: System error when calculating service area. Requested operator help.

content: Hi Mike, this is Judy from XYZ. Sorry for the wait! I’m just checking your address now to confirm we serve your area. I’ll be right with you.
You’re all set, Mike! 1438 Peterson Ave is definitely within our service area. Would you like to tell me a bit about the HVAC issue and your preferred date and time for a visit?
